UI-001.title: Add new href 'Forgot Password?'
UI-001.description: Add a 'Forgot Password?' link below the login form for users who need to reset their password

UI-002.title: Change the input field for password from type text to password
UI-002.description: Update the password input field to use type='password' for security, should obscure plain text, and add an eye icon to toggle visibility

UI-003.title: The 'Login' button would change from blue to green
UI-003.description: Update the Login button styling to use green background color instead of blue for better visibility

BE-001.title: Implement user authentication API endpoint
BE-001.description: Create REST API endpoint for user login authentication with JWT token generation and validation

BE-002.title: Fix password reset email service
BE-002.description: Resolve issue where password reset emails are not being sent due to SMTP configuration problems

DOPS-001.title: Setup CI/CD pipeline for automated deployments
DOPS-001.description: Configure GitHub Actions workflow for automated testing, building, and deployment to staging and production environments

DATA-001.title: Optimize user analytics database queries
DATA-001.description: Improve performance of user behavior analytics queries by adding proper indexes and optimizing SQL statements
